name: Cinnabar
meaning: Symbolizes joy, life, and eternity. Historically used in Taoist alchemy and imperial seals.

name: Tea White
meaning: The color of white tea buds, representing purity, simplicity, and the Zen state of mind.

name: Bamboo Green
meaning: Represents resilience, integrity, and the gentlemanly virtues in Confucian culture.

name: Persimmon Red
meaning: Symbolizes a bountiful harvest, festivity, and good fortune, often seen in autumn celebrations.

name: Rouge
meaning: A classic cosmetic color symbolizing beauty, romance, and the elegance of ancient court ladies.

name: Sky Blue after Rain
meaning: The legendary color of Ru ware porcelain, symbolizing clarity after a storm and rare beauty.

name: Goose Yellow
meaning: The color of newborn goslings and spring willow shoots, symbolizing new life and hope.

name: Ink Black
meaning: The depth of calligraphy ink, representing knowledge, mystery, and scholarly elegance.

name: Glaze Blue
meaning: A deep, translucent blue found in ancient glazes, symbolizing wisdom and tranquility.

name: Begonia Red
meaning: The color of begonia flowers, associated with longing, feminine beauty, and poetic sorrow.

name: Moonlit Plum
meaning: Inspired by plum blossoms under moonlight in Song Dynasty poetry, symbolizing quiet elegance.

name: Autumn Wheat
meaning: The golden hue of ripened wheat fields in Tang pastoral poems, representing harvest and abundance.

name: Frosted Lotus
meaning: The pale green-grey of lotus leaves touched by morning frost, evoking late autumn melancholy.

name: Drifting Smoke
meaning: The soft grey of incense smoke in temple paintings, suggesting spiritual transcendence.

name: Dragon Scale Blue
meaning: The iridescent blue-green of mythical dragon scales in Ming Dynasty textiles.

name: Swallow Rain
meaning: The cool blue-grey of spring rain observed by swallows in Yuan Dynasty landscape paintings.

name: Sunset Bell
meaning: The warm bronze of temple bells illuminated by setting sun in Buddhist poetry.

name: Phoenix Feather
meaning: The vibrant red-orange of mythical phoenix plumage in Han Dynasty lacquerware.

name: Frosted Peony
meaning: Symbolizes delicate beauty and resilience, inspired by peonies dusted with morning frost in Tang poetry.

name: Moonlit Bamboo
meaning: Represents tranquility and scholarly refinement, evoking bamboo groves under moonlight in Song dynasty paintings.

name: Autumn Cicada Wing
meaning: A translucent gold-green reminiscent of cicada wings in late autumn, symbolizing fleeting beauty.

name: Drifting Lotus Scent
meaning: The pale pink of lotus blossoms carried by summer breezes, celebrated in Qing dynasty garden poetry.

name: Swallow Rain Grey
meaning: The soft grey of spring rain seen through the wings of nesting swallows, a symbol of renewal.

name: Temple Bell Gold
meaning: The warm glow of Buddhist temple bells at dusk, representing spiritual resonance.

name: Frosted Cicada Wing
meaning: Inspired by the delicate transparency of cicada wings in early autumn frost.

name: Moonlit Bamboo Shadow
meaning: The subtle grey-green of bamboo shadows cast by moonlight in Song dynasty gardens.

name: Whispering Wind
meaning: A soft, ethereal hue inspired by the gentle whispers of the wind through ancient courtyards.

name: Distant Mountain
meaning: A muted green-grey reminiscent of mountains fading into the horizon in classical landscape paintings.

name: Lotus Heart
meaning: A delicate pink inspired by the innermost petals of a lotus, symbolizing purity and enlightenment.

name: Autumn Dew
meaning: A pale, translucent green-gold resembling dew on autumn grass at dawn.

name: Snowy Plum
meaning: A soft lavender-pink evoking plum blossoms dusted with snow in winter gardens.

name: River Mist
meaning: A cool, misty blue-grey inspired by early morning fog over tranquil rivers.

name: Golden Cicada
meaning: A warm, golden hue reminiscent of cicada wings glinting in the summer sun.

name: Twilight Bell
meaning: A deep, muted red-brown evoking the solemn tones of temple bells at dusk.

name: Silk Cloud
meaning: A delicate hue reminiscent of fine silk floating like clouds in the morning mist.

name: Brocade Dawn
meaning: The warm glow of dawn reflected on luxurious brocade fabrics.

name: Jade Thread
meaning: The serene green of jade woven into delicate threads of silk.

name: Golden Silk
meaning: The radiant shimmer of gold threads embedded in royal silk.

name: Indigo Weave
meaning: The deep blue of indigo-dyed fabric, woven with care and tradition.

name: Pearl Satin
meaning: The lustrous sheen of pearls reflected on smooth satin fabric.

name: Crimson Damask
meaning: The rich red of damask silk, symbolizing prosperity and joy.

name: Mist Linen
meaning: The subtle, earthy tone of linen softened by morning mist.

name: Jade Dream
meaning: A serene green reminiscent of jade treasures in ancient dreams.

name: Tea Whisper
meaning: The soft murmur of tea leaves steeping in a quiet morning.

name: Bamboo Veil
meaning: The delicate shade of bamboo curtains swaying in the breeze.

name: Celadon Mist
meaning: The ethereal green of celadon porcelain shrouded in morning mist.

name: Lotus Pond
meaning: The tranquil green of lotus leaves floating on a quiet pond.

name: Emerald Peak
meaning: The majestic green of distant mountain peaks bathed in sunlight.

name: Willow Shade
meaning: The cool green shade of willow trees by a riverside.

name: Moss Path
meaning: The ancient green of moss-covered stones along a hidden garden path.

name: Mountain Mist
meaning: A soft, ethereal hue reminiscent of mist clinging to ancient mountain peaks.

name: Pine Shadow
meaning: A deep, earthy green evoking the shadows cast by ancient pine trees.

name: Sunset Peak
meaning: A warm, fiery hue inspired by the last light of day on mountain summits.

name: Moonlit Stream
meaning: A cool, tranquil blue reminiscent of a stream bathed in moonlight.

name: Stone Gray
meaning: A sturdy, neutral gray inspired by the weathered stones of riverbanks.

name: Autumn Cliff
meaning: A rich, warm brown reminiscent of cliffs adorned with autumn foliage.

name: Frosted Peak
meaning: A pale, icy blue evoking the crisp air atop snow-capped mountains.

name: River Dawn
meaning: The soft blue-gray hue of a river at dawn, symbolizing tranquility and new beginnings.

name: Mountain Haze
meaning: The ethereal mist that clings to mountain peaks, evoking mystery and serenity.

name: Pebble Stream
meaning: The warm, earthy tone of stones smoothed by flowing water, representing resilience and time.

name: Snow Summit
meaning: The pristine white of snow-capped peaks, symbolizing purity and grandeur.

name: Forest Shadow
meaning: The deep green of shaded forests, embodying peace and hidden wisdom.

name: Sunlit Cascade
meaning: The golden glow of sunlight on a waterfall, representing energy and vitality.

name: Twilight Ravine
meaning: The dusky purple of a ravine at twilight, evoking introspection and quiet beauty.

name: Peach Blossom Dawn
meaning: Inspired by the delicate pink hues of peach blossoms at dawn, symbolizing fleeting beauty in Tang poetry.

name: Golden Oriole
meaning: The vibrant yellow of oriole feathers, often mentioned in Song Dynasty poems as a sign of prosperity.

name: Crimson Maple
meaning: The deep red of autumn maple leaves, evoking the melancholic beauty of seasonal change in Song poetry.

name: Jadeite Green
meaning: The luminous green of jadeite, representing purity and elegance in Tang Dynasty art and poetry.

name: Amber Sunset
meaning: The warm, golden-orange hues of a setting sun, often depicted in Song Dynasty landscape poetry.

name: Indigo Dream
meaning: The deep blue of indigo dye, symbolizing the mysterious and dreamlike quality of Tang Dynasty night poems.

name: White Plum Blossom
meaning: The pristine white of plum blossoms, representing resilience and purity in harsh winter, a favorite in Song poetry.

name: Azure Sky
meaning: Represents the vast and clear sky, symbolizing freedom and limitless possibilities.

name: Celestial Wave
meaning: Inspired by the waves of the heavenly river, embodying tranquility and divine connection.

name: Frosted Lake
meaning: Evokes the serene beauty of a lake touched by morning frost, symbolizing purity and calm.

name: Moonlit Glaze
meaning: Reflects the delicate sheen of moonlight on ceramic glaze, representing elegance and artistry.

name: Ocean Mist
meaning: Captures the ethereal mist rising from the ocean, symbolizing mystery and renewal.

name: Pearl River
meaning: Named after the luminous waters of the Pearl River, embodying prosperity and harmony.

name: Sky Dream
meaning: Represents the dreamy hues of the sky at dusk, symbolizing hope and imagination.

name: Turquoise Cloud
meaning: Inspired by the rare sight of turquoise clouds, symbolizing rarity and divine favor.

name: Autumn Harvest
meaning: Represents the golden hues of ripe grains during the autumn harvest season.

name: Golden Sunset
meaning: Captures the warm, golden glow of the setting sun in autumn skies.

name: Amber Glow
meaning: Resembles the radiant glow of amber, cherished for its beauty and warmth.

name: Harvest Moon
meaning: Evokes the golden light of the harvest moon, a symbol of abundance and celebration.

name: Gilded Dragon
meaning: Represents the golden scales of the dragon, a symbol of imperial power and good fortune.

name: Saffron Dust
meaning: Inspired by the precious saffron spice, symbolizing rarity and elegance.
